contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Paris metro |Name=Hoche |Day=12 October |Year=1942 |Access=3, rue Hoche<br>50, av. Jean Lolive<br>60, av. Jean Lolive |Municipality=Pantin |Zone=2 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next|5|Porte de Pantin|Église de Pantin}} | X=211 | Y=21 }} '''Hoche''' is a [[metro station|station]] of the [[Paris Métro]], serving [[Paris Métro Line 5|Line 5]]. The name refers to the rue Hoche, named for the 18th-century general [[Lazare Hoche]]. [[File:Hoche2.JPG|320px|thumb|left|Platforms]] {{Paris Metro/line 5}} {{Paris-metro-stub}} {{coord|48.891|N|2.403|E|display=title|source:nlwiki}} [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1942]]
